title: What's more accurate
body:
i'm confused...
 OP.GG is giving me a different MMR than Lol King is which is more accurate?

replies.body:
ok thank you because lol king gave me 100 more mmr than op.gg
guess they are just estimates thanks guys
Judge by the ranks of people you're playing with, not the inaccurate MMR calculators.

Personally I trust OP.GG more *however* it's good to keep in mind they're just estimates based on the ranks of people you get matched with/against and, as such, are bound to be inaccurate to some degree.
they're both wrong, so don't worry
